00001 #ifndef _RED_H
00002 #define _RED_H
00003 
00004 class redclass
00005 {
00006    public: 
00007    
00008    int th_l;
00009    int th_h;
00010    double pmax;
00011    double w_q;    // weight of last vaule for exponential averaging
00012    double avg;    // average queue size
00013    int count;
00014    int useaverage;
00015    
00016    double pb,pa;
00017    
00018    
00019    redclass()
00020    {
00021       pmax = 0.03; w_q = 0.002;  avg = 0; 
00022       count = -1, th_l = th_h = 0;
00023       useaverage=1;
00024    }
00025    
00026    double uniform(){return my_rand() / 32767.0;} 
00027    
00028    int Update(int qlen)
00029    {
00030       if(useaverage)
00031          return UpdateWithAverage(qlen); 
00032       else
00033          return UpdateWithCurrent(qlen); 
00034    
00035    }
00036    
00037    
00038    int UpdateWithAverage(int qlen)
00039    {
00040    
00041       int drop = 0;
00042 
00043       avg = (1-w_q)*avg + w_q*qlen; // update avg queue size
00044       
00045       if(th_l <= avg && th_h > avg)
00046       {
00047          count++;
00048          
00049          // calculate loss prob
00050          pb = pmax*(double)(avg-th_l)/(double)(th_h-th_l);
00051          pa = pb/(1.0-count*pb);
00052          
00053          // check, if to drop the packet
00054          if(uniform() <= pa)
00055          {
00056             drop = 1;
00057             count = 0;
00058          }
00059       } // avg is between the threshold
00060       else if(th_h <= avg)
00061       {
00062          drop = 1;
00063          count = 0;
00064       }
00065       else
00066          count = -1;
00067    
00068       return drop;
00069    
00070    }; // UpdateWithAverage
00071 
00072 
00073    int UpdateWithCurrent(int qlen)
00074    {
00075       int drop = 0;
00076    
00077       if(qlen < th_l){
00078          drop = 0;
00079       } else {
00080         if (qlen > th_h) {
00081           if(uniform() <= pmax) {
00082             drop = 1;
00083           } else {
00084             double ploss;
00085             ploss = pmax * (double)(qlen-th_l) / (double)( th_h - th_l);
00086             if(uniform() <= ploss)
00087               drop = 1;
00088             else
00089               drop = 0;
00090           }
00091         }
00092       }
00093       
00094       return drop;
00095   
00096    } // UpdateWithCurrent
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 
00101 }; // class redclass
00102 
00103 #endif  // _RED_H
